description: The Punic Wars against Carthage required the Romans to innovate in the area of naval arms. Their biggest innovation at this time was called the “corvus,” or crow, which was a long ramp or bridge which could be violently lowered onto an enemy ship and allow the attacking Roman ship to send its marines across to massacre the enemy crew.
tooltip: Unlock the “Corvus Quinquereme” for the Republican Romans, which is a Heavy Boarding Ship used to capture enemy Ships.
